mapper.insert: insert into rent_item ( rent_item_name, arrival_date, rental_price, rental_interval,district, user_id, amount, deposit_price, is_brand_new, is_bargain, description, is_deleted) values ( #{itemName}, #{arrivalDate}, #{rentalPrice}, #{rentalInterval}, #{district}, #{userID}, #{amount}, #{depositPrice}, #{isBrandNew}, #{isBargain}, #{description}, 0 );
mapper.update: update rent_item set rent_item_name = #{itemName}, rental_price = #{rentalPrice}, rental_interval = #{rentalInterval}, district = #{district}, user_id = #{userID}, amount = #{amount}, deposit_price = #{depositPrice}, is_brand_new = #{isBrandNew}, is_bargain = #{isBargain}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
